atk-s0511a28:2_1: caturo āsuṁ vināyakā’’tiādikā aṭṭhārasagāthā saṅgītikārakehi ṭhapitā nigamanagāthāti veditabbā.
atk-s0511a28:4_0: Imasmiṁ pana sakalepi buddhavaṁse niddiṭṭhānaṁ pañcavīsatiyā buddhānaṁ aṭṭha vemattāni veditabbāni. Katamāni aṭṭha? Āyuvemattaṁ, pamāṇavemattaṁ, kulavemattaṁ, padhānavemattaṁ, rasmivemattaṁ, yānavemattaṁ, bodhivemattaṁ, pallaṅkavemattanti.
atk-s0511a28:5_0: Tattha āyuvemattaṁ nāma keci dīghāyukā honti keci appāyukā.
atk-s0511a28:5_1: Tathā hi dīpaṅkaro koṇḍañño anomadassī padumo padumuttaro atthadassī dhammadassī siddhattho tissoti ime nava buddhā vassasatasahassāyukā ahesuṁ.
atk-s0511a28:5_2: Maṅgalo sumano sobhito nārado sumedho sujāto piyadassī phussoti ime aṭṭha buddhā navutivassasahassāyukā ahesuṁ.
atk-s0511a28:5_3: Revato vessabhū cāti ime dve buddhā saṭṭhivassasahassāyukā ahesuṁ.
atk-s0511a28:5_5: Sikhī kakusandho koṇāgamano kassapoti ime cattāro buddhā yathākkamena sattaticattālīsatiṁsavīsavassasahassāyukā ahesuṁ.
atk-s0511a28:5_6: Amhākaṁ pana bhagavato vassasataṁ āyuppamāṇaṁ ahosi.
atk-s0511a28:5_7: Upacitapuññasambhārānaṁ dīghāyukasaṁvattaniyakammasamupetānampi buddhānaṁ yugavasena āyuppamāṇaṁ appamāṇaṁ ahosi.
atk-s0511a28:6_0: Pamāṇavemattaṁ nāma keci dīghā honti keci rassā.
atk-s0511a28:7_0: Kulavemattaṁ nāma keci khattiyakule nibbattiṁsu keci brāhmaṇakule.
atk-s0511a28:8_1: Maṅgala-sumedhatissa sikhīnaṁ aṭṭhamāsikā. Revatassa sattamāsikā. Sobhitassa cattāro māsā.
atk-s0511a28:8_5: Amhākaṁ buddhassa chabbassāni padhānacariyā ahosi. Ayaṁ padhānavemattaṁ nāma.
atk-s0511a28:9_0: Rasmivemattaṁ nāma maṅgalassa kira sammāsambuddhassa sarīrasmi dasasahassilokadhātuṁ pharitvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a28:9_2: Vipassissa bhagavato sattayojanikā ahosi. Sikhissa tiyojanappamāṇā. Kakusandhassa dasayojanikā.
atk-s0511a28:9_3: Amhākaṁ bhagavato samantato byāmappamāṇā. Sesānaṁ aniyatā ahosi.
atk-s0511a28:9_4: Ayaṁ rasmivemattaṁ nāma ajjhāsayapaṭibaddhaṁ, yo yattakaṁ icchati,
atk-s0511a28:9_6: paṭividdhaguṇe pana kassaci vemattaṁ nāma natthi. Ayaṁ rasmivemattaṁ nāma.
atk-s0511a28:10_0: Yānavemattaṁ nāma keci hatthiyānena keci assayānena keci rathapada-pāsāda-sivikādīsu aññatarena nikkhamanti.
atk-s0511a28:10_5: Sobhita-padumuttara-dhammadassī-kassapā pāsādena nikkhamiṁsu. Ayaṁ yānavemattaṁ nāma.
atk-s0511a28:11_0: Bodhivemattaṁ nāma dīpaṅkarassa bhagavato kapītanarukkho bodhi;
atk-s0511a28:11_3: padumanāradānaṁ mahāsoṇarukkho, padumuttarassa salalarukkho, sumedhassa nīpo, sujātassa veḷu, piyadassino kakudho, atthadassissa campakarukkho,
atk-s0511a28:11_5: siddhatthassa kaṇikārarukkho, tissassa asanarukkho, phussassa āmalakarukkho, vipassissa pāṭalirukkho, sikhissa puṇḍarīkarukkho, vessabhussa sālarukkho, kakusandhassa sirīsarukkho,
atk-s0511a28:12_5: kakusandhassa chabbīsatihattho, koṇāgamanassa vīsatihattho, kassapassa pannarasahattho,
atk-s0511a28:12_6: gotamassa cuddasahattho pallaṅko ahosi. Ayaṁ pallaṅkavemattaṁ nāma. Imāni aṭṭha vemattāni nāma.
atk-s0511a28:14_0: Sabbabuddhānaṁ pana cattāri avijahitaṭṭhānāni nāma honti.
atk-s0511a28:14_1: Sabbabuddhānañhi bodhipallaṅko avijahito ekasmiṁyeva ṭhāne hoti.
atk-s0511a28:14_4: Jetavane gandhakuṭiyā cattāri mañcapādaṭṭhānāni avijahitāneva honti.
atk-s0511a28:14_5: Vihāro pana khuddakopi mahantopi hoti. Vihāro na vijahatiyeva, nagaraṁ pana vijahati.
atk-s0511a28:16_0: Aparaṁ pana amhākaṁyeva bhagavato sahajātaparicchedañca nakkhattaparicchedañca dīpesuṁ.
atk-s0511a28:16_1: Amhākaṁ sabbaññubodhisattena kira saddhiṁ rāhulamātā ānandatthero channo kaṇḍako assarājā nidhikumbho mahābodhi kāḷudāyīti imāni satta sahajātāni. Ayaṁ sahajātaparicchedo.
atk-s0511a28:16_2: Mahāpuriso pana uttarāsāḷhanakkhatteneva mātukucchiṁ okkami, mahābhinikkhamanaṁ nikkhami, dhammacakkaṁ pavattesi, yamakapāṭihāriyaṁ akāsi.
atk-s0511a28:16_3: Visākhanakkhattena jāto ca abhisambuddho ca parinibbuto ca.
atk-s0511a28:16_4: Māghanakkhattena tassa sāvakasannipāto ca āyusaṅkhāravosajjanañca ahosi.
atk-s0511a28:18_0: Idāni pana sabbesaṁ buddhānaṁ sādhāraṇadhammataṁ pakāsayissāma.
atk-s0511a28:18_6: kañcanapaṭṭesu patiṭṭhitapādānaṁ uttarābhimukhānaṁ sattapadavītihārānaṁ gantvā catuddisaṁ oloketvā sīhanādanadanaṁ,
atk-s0511a28:18_7: cattāri nimittāni disvā jātamattaputtānaṁ mahāsattānaṁ mahābhinikkhamanaṁ,
atk-s0511a28:18_8: arahaddhajamādāya pabbajitvā sabbaheṭṭhimena paricchedena sattāhaṁ padhānacariyā,
atk-s0511a28:18_12: bodhipallaṅkeyeva tisso vijjā ādiṁ katvā asādhāraṇañāṇādiguṇapaṭilābho,
atk-s0511a28:18_21: uppanne vatthumhi sikkhāpadapaññāpanaṁ uppannāya aṭṭhuppattiyā jātakakathanaṁ,
atk-s0511a28:18_27: catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasamāpattiyo samāpajjitvā parinibbānanti imā samattiṁsa sabbabuddhānaṁ dhammatāti.
atk-s0511a28:20_0: Sabbabuddhānaṁ cattāro anantarāyikā dhammā. Katame cattāro?
atk-s0511a28:20_1: Buddhānaṁ uddissa abhihaṭānaṁ catunnaṁ paccayānaṁ na sakkā kenaci antarāyo kātuṁ.
atk-s0511a28:20_2: Buddhānaṁ āyuno na sakkā kenaci antarāyo kātuṁ.
atk-s0511a28:20_5: Buddhānaṁ dvattiṁsamahāpurisalakkhaṇānaṁ asītiyā anubyañjanānañca na sakkā kenaci antarāyo kātuṁ.
atk-s0511a28:20_6: Buddharaṁsīnaṁ na sakkā kenaci antarāyo kātunti.
atk-s0511a28:41_0: Sukhaṁ hotu niccaṁ varaṁ nārakāpi, pisācāpayātā pipāsā bhavantu.
atk-s0511a28:49_0: Antarāyaṁ vinā esā, yathā niṭṭhaṁ upāgatā;
